crazyballrun.game.level

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • crazyballrun.game.level.Level

  • public class Level
extends java.lang.Object
    The Level class contains all necessary information for playing on a map. This includes all textures, texture-collision maps and objects of the level.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Level()
      Creates an instance of Level.

      • createObject

        public LevelObject createObject(java.lang.String obj,
                       Vector2D pos,
                       int layer,
                       double rotation)
        Creates an object and puts it into the level-object-list.
        Parameters:
        obj - filename of the object (without file extension)
        pos - position of the object
        layer - layer of the object
        rotation - angle of rotation
        Returns:
        reference to the new object

      • removeObject

        public void removeObject(LevelObject obj)
        Removes a (dead/destroyed) object from the level's object-list.
        Parameters:
        obj - reference to the object

      • getObjectList

        public java.util.LinkedList<LevelObject> getObjectList()
        Clones the level's object-list threadsavely.
        Returns:

        x - position of the tile (in textures)
        y - position of the tile (in textures)
        layer - layer of the tile

        public Tile getTile(Vector2D pos,
           int layer)
        Finds one "tile" of the level at a given position on the given layer.
        Parameters:

        layer - layer (z-coordinate) of the tile
        Returns:
        a reference to the Tile

      • getTile

        public Tile getTile(double x,
           double y,
           int layer)
        Finds one "tile" of the level at a given position on the given layer. Also checks if the position is valid (inside of the bounds).
        Parameters:
        x - position of the tile
        y - position of the tile
        layer - layer (z-coordinate) of the tile
        Returns:
        a reference to the Tile

        public CollisionTexture.GroundProperty getGroundProperty(Vector2D pos,
                                                int layer)
        Finds the ground property at a particular point in the level.
        Parameters:
        pos - coordinate vector to desribe the point
        layer - map layer ("z-axis")
        Returns:
        the ground property for a specific point
